ie.gmit.sw

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class, Facade. Initialize and share application wide variables. Servlet initialized variables, Logging queue, Jobs inQueue, Results outQueue and Thread pool of workers.
    Author:
    Martin Repicky G00328337@gmit.ie

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Util.Config
      Inner class for configuration variables.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static java.lang.Boolean init()
        Initialize application wide, concurrent variables as well as ThreadPool of workers.

      • getInQueue

        public static java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<Job> getInQueue()
        Returns:
        ArrayBlockingQueue. Used by UploadHandler Servlet and Worker

      • getOutQueue

        public static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,Results> getOutQueue()
        Returns:
        ConcurrentHashmap of Integer, Results. Used by worker and PoolHandler Servlet.

      • getJobNumber

        public static int getJobNumber()
        Returns:
        jobNumber integer. Used by UploadHandler to assign unique job number.

      • getWorkerNumber

        public static int getWorkerNumber()
        Returns:
        wokerNumber integer. Used by Worker.class to keep track of workers. Not displayed, only for logging purposes.

      • processJob

        public static boolean processJob(Job job)
        Add a new Worker to Thread pool. If more than predefine workers are submitted then they are held in a queue until threads become available.

      • getServLog

        public static java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<java.lang.String> getServLog()
        Returns:
        ArrayBlockingQueue of Strings. Used by LogService.class.

      • getHashFunctionsSize

        public static int getHashFunctionsSize()
        Returns:
        Integer. Used by Worker.class and passed to MinHash.class

      • getShingleSize

        public static int getShingleSize()
        Returns:
        Integer. Size of Shingle. Number of words per shingle. Used by Worker.

      • getDb

        public static DocumentDao getDb()
        Returns:
        DocumentDao interface. Used by MinHash.class when accessing database.

      • isLoggingOn

        public static boolean isLoggingOn()
        Returns:
        Boolean. Determine the state of Logging service, On or Off.

      • getRefreshRate

        public static int getRefreshRate()
        Returns:
        Integer. Determine refresh delay for results pooling.

      • logMessage

        public static void logMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Logging service entry point. Function is called by any class to log, to console and file, any warnings, errors and such. ArrayBlockingQueue.offer is nonBlocking.
        Parameters:
        message - String to be logged.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Safe shutting down of thread pool, prevent possible memory leaks.

                 throws java.lang.Throwable
